Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.player

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Character  
    Player
    A class containing attributes that identify a single player and methods used to keep track of user's progress in the game.
    PlayerBoard
    Board used by each player to keep track of his points, damages, cubes and every other detail needed to proceed during the game.
    PlayerHand
    This class provides methods and attributes to manage every card the player has during the game, giving an easy way to update, add or remove them.
    User
    The User class describes a single user of the network
